```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### What to submit for Week 1

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#4682b4"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#4682b4"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              checked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked,
            unchecked,
            unchecked,
            checked,
            unchecked),

Description = c("Complete modules in Data Camp that address more about tidying data and introduces basic statistics in R.",
"Think about a population to test",
"Review aspects of the basics of program evaluation if needed",
"Respond to one of the posts from last week",
"Review some literature on research designs and measurement properties in R"),

Location = c("[Link](/datacamp/02-module/)",
             "[Link](/tasks/02-tasks/#creating-an-argument)",
"[Link](/tasks/02-tasks/#basics-of-evaluation)",
"[Link](/readings/02-readings/#read-some-papers)",
             "[Link](/readings/02-readings/#review-some-materials)")

)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'cclc') %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>%
  row_spec(0, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') %>%
  row_spec(2, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;') 
```
